title: George Metzger - Beyond Time And Again
description:
Beautiful scan of a forgotten underground classic.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

'Beyond Time And Again'

Kyle & Whear, 1976, 56 pages

Written and Illustrated by George Metzger


The story of Earth of the far future, an Earth living in the half-light of a dying sun, the past in shadow, her knowledge and arts lost and discovered a thousand times over, an Earth whose people while away their days, some with dreams and revelries, some seeking the arts of the past to escape the future - and it is the story of Seth of Comstock who seeks his own destiny across time and space...

From the valley of the ritual of Birth and Death, to the great high mountains of madness where the lady Panchandara is linked forever to him, to the nightmare underground world of weremen, to the City of Magicians where Lolcraft the wizard struggles against the fall of eternal night, to the final bastion of Humanity on Earth - Seth roams a world immeasurably changed but still unforgetably our own.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

George Metzger is one of the all-time great underground comix artists, but he never quite reached the same levels of recognition as many of his peers. Click on his name in the tags up above to check out some undergrounds that contain contributions from Mr. Metzger.
